name: Phoros
tagline: Sources for the study of Athenian tribute
body:
The Phoros project is creating new editions of the epigraphic sources for the study of tribute in
ancient Athens, based on new, openly licensed photography.  All of our editorial work is freely
available from github repositories as simple text files or TEI-conformant XML editions.

## gists and bl.ocks


[![thumb1]](http://bl.ocks.org/neelsmith/9323752) Extant [payment records](http://bl.ocks.org/neelsmith/9323752)

[thumb1]: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/9323752/raw/thumbnail.png


## Links

- archive of [downloadable images](http://shot.holycross.edu/phoros-image-archive)
- test installation of a [servlet with end-user applications](http://beta.hpcc.uh.edu/tomcat/phoros/) for working with the archive
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
